artefact.overview: You need a water abstraction licence if you remove more than 20 cubic meters of water a day from a watercourse or underground water reserve in England and Wales
artefact.licence_short_description: You need a water abstraction licence from the Environment Agency if you remove more than 20 cubic meters of water a day from a watercourse or underground water reserve in England and Wales.
artefact.licence_overview: To remove more than 20 cubic metres of water a day from a watercourse or underground water reserve in England or Wales you need a licence from the [Environment Agency.](http://www.environment-agency.gov.uk/ "Environment Agency"){:rel="external"}

details.description: Applying for licences from your council for events and businesses
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.
